subject: Horse Racing
Television
Ratings (Audience Measurement)
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: The second-place finish of the Triple Crown winner at the Travers Stakes on Saturday was watched by 3.4 million people on NBC, making it the most-watched Travers in the last 20 years.
snippet: The second-place finish of the Triple Crown winner at the Travers Stakes on Saturday was watched by 3.4 million people on NBC, making it the most-watched Travers in the last 20 years.
